Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A Streptococcus) nucleic acid
Specimen Type(s): Nasal or nasopharyngeal swabs eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott ID NOW Instrument with Influenza A & B 2 and Strep A 2 assays using isothermal nucleic acid amplification for rapid detection of influenza A/B viral RNA and Group A Streptococcus nucleic acid.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA from nasal or nasopharyngeal swabs and rapid detection of Group A Streptococcus (Streptococcus pyogenes) from throat swab specimens in patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection or pharyngitis.
